metadata.name: Marsha Coleman-Adebayo (Bronze, Plinth 2)
metadata.description:
Marsha Coleman-Adebayo (Bronze, Plinth 2) is a unique artwork within Monuments of the Disclosed, artist Ahmet Öğüt's first NFT collection. While a senior policy analyst at the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA), Marsha Coleman-Adebayo blew the whistle on an American chemical company for exposing South African miners to toxic levels of vanadium. 

Monuments of the Disclosed was commissioned by Artwrld. 

License: [artwrld.com/license](https://artwrld.com/license)
